text: Gibran Rakabuming Raka (born 1 October 1987) is an Indonesian politician and businessperson who has been the 14th and current Vice President of Indonesia since 2024. Before, he was the mayor of Surakarta from 2021 to 2024. He is the oldest child of 7th President of Indonesia, Joko Widodo. In the 2024 presidential election, he successfully ran as the vice presidential candidate of Prabowo Subianto. ==References== Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Vice presidents of Indonesia Category:Indonesian businesspeople
title: Gibran Rakabuming Raka
